mapper.select: SELECT t.sheetID, DATE_FORMAT(t.date, '%m.%d') as date, t.CarNo, t.carSubmit, t.carSubmitTel, t.chk1, s.sheetsubID, s.fromsite, s.tosite, s.item, s.Qty, s.Qtyup FROM tsheet t JOIN tSheet_sub s ON t.sheetID = s.sheetID2 WHERE t.carNo = #{CarNo}
SELECT IF(sum(s.Qty * s.Qtyup) IS NULL, 0, sum(s.Qty * s.Qtyup)) FROM tSheet t JOIN tsheet_sub s ON t.sheetID = s.sheetID2 WHERE t.carNo = #{CarNo}
